description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Skyfish is an angry orange fish who must bubble-shoot and tongue-swing his way through this humorous and silly platform adventure. He now faces his greatest enemies  like his ex-girlfriend, floating heads, tsunamis, screaming cats, and a radioactive stick-figure hedgehog!! Laid back silly fun is here!
